document_data.name: Bladecall
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bladecall''''' was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] spell known in the realm of [[Cormanthyr]].
document_data.Powers: The spell snatched several blades from elsewhere and sent them flashing point-first, towards a given target.
document_data.History:
In {{yearlink|240}}, [[Elminster Aumar]] used this spell against a number of bandits.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|23-24|1}}

In {{yearlink|261}}, during the coup attempt by [[Llombaerth Starym]], the latter attempted to magically compel [[Elminster Aumar]] to cast the spell to attack the [[Srinshee]]. Elminster later cast this spell on his own to attack Llombaerth's forces instead.
